methods.name: getCustomer
methods.doc: Retrieves a Customer object based on lookup by id

methods.name: createCustomer
methods.doc: Creates a new Customer object with given attributes, and stores it into the databases

methods.name: editCustomer
methods.doc: Retrieves a Customer by ID, and modifies its attributes according to editCustomer's arguments before re-storing

methods.name: addToCart
methods.doc: Adds quantity number of a single game to customer cart

methods.name: addToWishlist
methods.doc: Adds a game to the wishlist. Must not already be there.

methods.name: removeFromCart
methods.doc: Removes all copies of a specific game from cart.

methods.name: removeFromWishlist
methods.doc: Removes all copies of a specific game from wishlist.

methods.name: getPastOrdersString
methods.doc: Returns the string value of every past order of the Customer.
